languages.text: {n}Близоруко прищурившись и разглядев наконец, кто перед ним, мужчина падает на колени и, скорчив плаксивую физиономию, начинает горестно причитать:{/n} "Ахти! Помилуйте, Ваша Светлость! Не признал сослепу!"

{n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Близоруко прищурившись и разглядев наконец, кто перед ним, мужчина падает на колени и, скорчив плаксивую физиономию, начинает горестно причитать:{/n} "Ахти! Помилуйте, Ваша Светлость! Не признал сослепу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man narrows his weak eyes and finally sees who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blast these old eyes, I didn't recognise you!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}老人眯起了眼睛，突然意识到站在他面前的人是谁。他猛地跪倒在地，嚎啕大哭，一把鼻涕一把泪地哭了起来。{/n}“黄金王座在上啊！饶命啊，大人，饶了我吧！我这老眼睛都花了，刚刚都没认出你来！”
languages.original_text: {n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人眯起了眼睛，突然意识到站在他面前的人是谁。他猛地跪倒在地，嚎啕大哭，一把鼻涕一把泪地哭了起来。{/n}“黄金王座在上啊！饶命啊，大人，饶了我吧！我这老眼睛都花了，刚刚都没认出你来！”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}男は弱々しい目を細め、自身の目の前に立っているのが誰なのか、ようやく理解した。彼は膝から崩れ落ち、泣きそうな顔をし、叫んだ。{/n}「祝福された王座よ！慈悲を、陛下！私はこの老眼のせいで、あなたが誰だかわかりませんでした！」
languages.original_text: {n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男は弱々しい目を細め、自身の目の前に立っているのが誰なのか、ようやく理解した。彼は膝から崩れ落ち、泣きそうな顔をし、叫んだ。{/n}「祝福された王座よ！慈悲を、陛下！私はこの老眼のせいで、あなたが誰だかわかりませんでした！」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}El hombre entrecierra los ojos y por fin se da cuenta de a quién tiene delante. Cae de rodillas con gesto plañidero y gime:{/n} «¡Loado sea el Trono! ¡Piedad, mi{mf|lord|lady}, piedad! Mis ojos no son lo que eran, ¡no le he reconocido!».
languages.original_text: {n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre entrecierra los ojos y por fin se da cuenta de a quién tiene delante. Cae de rodillas con gesto plañidero y gime:{/n} «¡Loado sea el Trono! ¡Piedad, mi{mf|lord|lady}, piedad! Mis ojos no son lo que eran, ¡no le he reconocido!».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Der Mann kneift seine schwachen Augen zusammen und erkennt endlich, wer da vor ihm steht. Er fällt mit einer weinerlichen Grimasse auf die Knie und heult:{/n} "Gesegneter Thron! Gnade, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, habt Erbarmen! Meine verfluchten alten Augen haben Euch nicht erkannt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann kneift seine schwachen Augen zusammen und erkennt endlich, wer da vor ihm steht. Er fällt mit einer weinerlichen Grimasse auf die Knie und heult:{/n} "Gesegneter Thron! Gnade, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, habt Erbarmen! Meine verfluchten alten Augen haben Euch nicht erkannt!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard plisse les yeux et reconnaît enfin la personne qui se tient devant lui. Il tombe à genoux, l'air implorant, et se met à gémir :{/n} « Par le Trône ! Ayez pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! Mes yeux fatigués vous avaient pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieillard plisse les yeux et reconnaît enfin la personne qui se tient devant lui. Il tombe à genoux, l'air implorant, et se met à gémir :{/n} « Par le Trône ! Ayez pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! Mes yeux fatigués vous avaient pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue} ! »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Adam, zor gören gözlerini kısıyor ve nihayetinde karşısında duranın kim olduğunu anlıyor. Ağlamaklı bir hâlde dizleri üzerine çöküp yalvarıyor.{/n} "Taht aşkına! Affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, acıyın bana! Kör olası gözlerim sizi tanıyamadı!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man squints with his weak eyes and finally realises who is standing before him. He collapses to his knees with a whiny grimace and wails,{/n} "Blessed Throne! Mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! Blasted old eyes didn't recognise you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, zor gören gözlerini kısıyor ve nihayetinde karşısında duranın kim olduğunu anlıyor. Ağlamaklı bir hâlde dizleri üzerine çöküp yalvarıyor.{/n} "Taht aşkına! Affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, acıyın bana! Kör olası gözlerim, tanıyamadı sizi!"
traits.speaker: OldMan
